name: Mousetic Quest (Short Jam Game)
description:
Very short little game I made during a jam session with Siactro where we both tried to make a GB game using gbstudio (which we both used for the first time) in 48 hours.

Tutorial: Go to the dungeon, bonk gobbos, get herbs, get rich. Play via the web build or the included rom file.

Credits:

Music: aj booker, Mr.V
Additional tiles: Teaceratops, sondanielson
